nodes.text: The Anapolla Musical Splash was a musical attraction at Lamuir IV's Priole Danna Festival showcasing several different genres of music from the galaxy's most famous recording artists, as well as new performers. A 5-day event, the Splash included pieces from many Human and alien traditions. Many artist who played the Splash tended to emerge as powerful and popular stars, and many attending the event were usually recording studio representatives.
